body: Notice how the dress is very short on her. Maybe that's the dress she wore when she was younger and when she was with the missing naoya. And notice how she said "it feels nice to be an adult" when she lost her virginity, or the fact she always kept her virginity. I think this missing naoya has been mentally affecting her age. Just my observation.

@prophet.alien0 my guess is that Naoya disappeared by causes unrelated to her but I think I agree with the rest of your theory, as for a continuation it seems unlikely, not only a long time has passed since this was published (11 or 12 years) but also it seems that the author has changed genres, not many yandere works and now mostly does the tried and true formula of NTR with ugly bastard, and even those earlier works tend to end this way, a lot of room for further exploration but never happens I guess that would diminish the impact of the endings but it is kinda unsatisfactory, I read those Tsukasa Blog / Valentine day doujins at least 10 years ago (and just now I found them again) and I always felt it needed a 3rd chapter which was never made it seems.

my theory is .... naoya left or got a girlfriend ..she find out and did something (kill him for cheating or leaving them created a doll after him due to her obsession) that would explained the missing flier .. now this kid naoto unlucky for him he happens to look like him or exactly like him. she probably started the turtoring just to stay close to him to a point of suspicious behavior caught by naoto; who decided to follow her home and discover the doll. and the rest we know for the story .. well is only my theory, hope the artist continue the story at some point
i feel as if she destroyed the doll because it LOOKED like naoto now, and treated the actual naoto well because he looks like naoyo after removing the headband>?

@Tristan182 the original one probably did get missing...and she was in grief because of that and decided not to be in a relationship...until he saw her friend's child which i would assume the missing person's sister or maybe just a blood relative as the child(the mc) looks alot like the missing child....cus it said 1993 while i assume the plot takes place in the 2000s at the least and at most 2010s...dunno tho maybe you're right...
Yandere without killing nor suiciding always does the work...8/10

So we do have proof that Naoya exists but why did she save her virginity for Naoto if she disposed of Naoya already? I would've guessed she did something to Naoya too back then but she's still a virgin? So many unanswered questions I need a backstory to this one

He had official records so he did exist. My guess is that she killed him when he was 10. Why is anyone's guess was he put off by her advances? did he get a girlfriend? I think the latter is likely "I won't let go of you this time"
So did Naoya die? Did he run away? Did he even exist in the first place?
